org.ow2.bonita.facade
Interface IdentityAPI

public interface IdentityAPI

Bonita Identity API. This API purpose is to manage the users referential.

Author:
Anthony Birembaut, Matthieu Chaffotte

addUser

User addUser(String username,
             String password,
             String firstName,
             String lastName,
             String title,
             String jobTitle,
             String managerUserUUID,
             Map<String,String> profileMetadata)
             throws UserAlreadyExistsException,
                    UserNotFoundException,
                    MetadataNotFoundException
Create a new a user

Parameters:
username - the user's username
password - the user's password
firstName - the user's first name
lastName - the user's last name
title - the user's title
jobTitle - the user's job title
managerUserUUID - the user's manager's UUID
profileMetadata - the user's profile metadata where the key of the map should be the name of one of the defined profile metadata
Returns:
the User created
Throws:
UserAlreadyExistsException
UserNotFoundException
MetadataNotFoundException

importUser

User importUser(String userUUID,
                String username,
                String passwordHash,
                String firstName,
                String lastName,
                String title,
                String jobTitle,
                String managerUserUUID,
                Map<String,String> profileMetadata)
                throws UserAlreadyExistsException,
                       MetadataNotFoundException
Import a user

Parameters:
userUUID - the user UUID (should be URL compliant)
username - the user's username
passwordHash - the hash of the user's password
firstName - the user's first name
lastName - the user's last name
title - the user's title
jobTitle - the user's job title
managerUserUUID - the user's manager's UUID
profileMetadata - the user's profile metadata where the key of the map should be the name of one of the defined profile metadata
Returns:
the User created
Throws:
UserAlreadyExistsException
UserNotFoundException
MetadataNotFoundException

updateUser

@Deprecated
User updateUser(String oldUsername,
                           String username,
                           String password,
                           String firstName,
                           String lastName,
                           String email)
                throws UserNotFoundException,
                       UserAlreadyExistsException
Deprecated. use updateUserByUUID(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Map) to update the user's info and use updateUserPassword(String, String) to change the user's password.

Update a user

Parameters:
oldUsername - the actual username of the user to update
username - the user's username
password - the user's password
firstName - the user's first name
lastName - the user's last name
email - the user's email
Returns:
the updated User
Throws:
UserNotFoundException
UserAlreadyExistsException

                      Map<String,String> profileMetadata)
                      throws UserNotFoundException,
                             UserAlreadyExistsException,
                             MetadataNotFoundException

username - the user's username

lastName - the user's last name
title - the user's title
jobTitle - the user's job title
managerUserUUID - the user's manager's UUID
profileMetadata - the user's profile metadata where the key of the map should be the name of one of the defined profile metadata

the updated User

UserNotFoundException

                                     String groupUUID)
                                     throws RoleNotFoundException,
                                            GroupNotFoundException
Retrieve all the users in a given role inside a group. This method return the same result as getAllUsersInMembership except you don't need to know the membership UUID for the role-group association

Parameters:
roleUUID - the role UUID
groupUUID - the group UUID
Returns:
a Set of users
Throws:
RoleNotFoundException
GroupNotFoundException
